text: The National University of Ireland is a university in Galway. It was opened as Queen's College Galway, in 1845. It has become known as University College Galway, since 1908. It is one of the universities (or colleges) that make up National University of Ireland. == Other websites == * Official website Category:19th-century establishments in the Republic of Ireland Category:1845 establishments in Europe Galway Category:County Galway
title: National University of Ireland, Galway
